revised_title: Miles Partridge: A Pioneer in Connective Tissue Biochemistry
tldr: Miles Partridge was a pioneering biochemist who made significant contributions to the understanding of connective tissue, particularly elastin and glycosaminoglycans. His work helped characterize elastin as a protein and revealed its unique structure, leading to advancements in connective tissue research. Partridge also made important discoveries about the structure of glycosaminoglycans and their role in connective tissue development.
